objects.text:
Seth Thomas Schoolhouse
Classic Octagonal Design

• Authentic craftsmanship
• Traditional Roman numerals
• Classic pendulum design

product_details.name: Vintage Seth Thomas Schoolhouse Wall Clock - Classic Octagonal Design
product_details.description:
• Authentic Seth Thomas clockmaker craftsmanship
• Elegant octagonal shape with dark wood frame
• Traditional Roman numeral dial face
• Classic pendulum design in lower compartment
• Perfect for home, office, or vintage collections
• Timeless schoolhouse clock style
• Large, easy-to-read white dial face
• Distinctive black frame with period-correct finish
• Wall-mounted design saves space
• Adds sophisticated charm to any room decor

banner_details:
This banner features a vintage-themed aesthetic that promotes a classic wall clock. The layout is elegantly divided vertically, with the left half in a rich dark brown containing decorative text elements and the right half in a soft cream tone displaying a photograph of the octagonal product. The main title (`heading`) is styled with an ornate serif font, exuding antiquity. A subtle subheading (`subheading`) and description list (`description`) emphasize craftsmanship and design features. A bold price tag (`price`) stands out beneath it. A call-to-action button (`cta`) overlays a muted accent rectangle (`cta_background`). Decorative dotted circles and lines enhance visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Brown: #362F2D
- Cream: #F5F1E9
- Beige Accent: #A89078
- Pale Ivory Text: #E8D8C0
product_color: The product image features a vintage Seth Thomas wall clock with a rich, classic color palette ideal for creating an elegant advertisement banner. Dominant colors include deep mahogany brown (#3B2F2F) from the clock’s wooden casing, and antique ivory (#F5F5DC) on the clock face. Accents of muted brass (#BDA55D) are seen on the pendulum frame, adding a touch of sophistication. Black (#000000) Roman numerals and clock hands are sharply contrasted against the cream dial, effectively highlighting timey elegance. The overall color harmony evokes heritage, reliability, and timeless craftsmanship, making these hues perfect for reinforcing a classic, premium brand identity.
